title: Milestones Web 3 Graphic Design Asssets
description: Drive visibility and engagement for a conference uniting thinkers, activists, and academics critiquing techno-feudalism—the consolidation of power by digital platforms and algorithmic systems. I’ll design and execute a multi-channel campaign (social, newsletters, media outreach, partnerships) to highlight the urgency of these conversations

milestones.title: Positioning & Messaging
milestones.description: Develop a strong narrative framework that captures the stakes of techno-feudalism (concentration of power, erosion of democracy, worker precarity). Create brand assets, talking points, and media kits that position the conference as the leading forum on the issue.

milestones.title: Outreach & Campaign Rollout
milestones.description: Amplify voices of key speakers through content drops and video teasers. Drive early RSVPs with thought-leadership articles and community engagement.

milestones.title: Amplification & Legacy Building
milestones.description: Ensure the conference’s ideas outlast the event itself by building a digital archive and an ongoing community channel.
